ValidationRule.description: If case Type is selected with 'Credit Adjustment' and case SubType with 'Other', the "Other" text field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISBLANK( Other__c ), ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c, "Other"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Credit Adjustment"), $Setup.Validation_Rules__c.Bypass_Rules__c = False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Other field needs to be populated if Case Type = "Credit Adjustment" and Case SubType = "Other"
